name: 4th International Conference on Catalysis and Chemical Engineering
content: We are pleased to intimate you for 4th International Conference on Catalysis and Chemical Engineering conference which is going to be held at Valencia, Spain during June 21-22,2023\. CAT CHEM-2023 will give a profound impulse into the most recent breakthroughs and innovative headway in the field through its theme “Assembling Trivial Keys in Catalysis and Chemical Engineering”. This two-day event will have keynote sessions, oral and poster sessions, and our ever-popular ‘Workshop’ events, providing something for everyone focusing on latest advancements. This worldwide congress is for established and early-career scientists, researchers, academicians, chemists, chemical engineers, policymakers, professors, students, and industrial researchers who are interested in the fundamentals of catalysis and chemical engineering and how they might impact various fields of science. This event is anticipating attendees all over the world come together to collaborate and network.
